res_img_laws_deepfake.title: Potential Violation: Anti-Cybercrime Act
res_img_laws_deepfake.content: Kung ang mga images ay digitally produced, inedit, o doctored, pwedeng violation ito ng Anti-Cybercrime Act.

res_img_laws_safe_spaces.title: Potential Violation: Safe Spaces Act
res_img_laws_safe_spaces.content: Kung ang mga images o videos ay nakakahiya, defamatory, o nananakot, pwedeng violation ito ng Safe Spaces Act.

res_img_laws_privacy.title: Potential Violation: Data Privacy Act
res_img_laws_privacy.content: Kung ginagamit ang mga images o videos pati ang identity mo para magpanggap na ikaw, pwedeng violation ito ng Data Privacy Act.

res_img_laws_voyeur.title: Potential Violation: Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act
res_img_laws_voyeur.content: Kung nakuha ang mga images o videos nang patago o wala kang consent, pwedeng violation ito ng Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act.

res_img_laws_intimate.title: Potential Violation: Safe Spaces / Voyeurism
res_img_laws_intimate.content: Kung ang mga images ay may intimate o explicit materials, pwedeng violation ito ng Safe Spaces Act, Anti-Photo/Video Voyeurism Act, at iba pang special protections.

res_img_laws_minor.title: Potential Violation: Anti-OSAEC / Anti-Child Abuse
res_img_laws_minor.content: Kung ang mga images ay may minors (bata na under 18), pwedeng violation ito ng Anti-OSAEC Law, Anti-Child Abuse Law, at may karapatan ka sa special protections.

res_imp_action.title: I-report ang Impersonation
res_imp_action.content: Mukhang kailangan mo itong i-resolve diretso sa platform o sa taong involved. Pwede kaming tumulong mag-draft ng formal complaint base sa info na binigay mo, o ikonekta ka sa ibang resources.

res_imp_action_2.title: I-report ang Impersonation
res_imp_action_2.content: Mukhang kailangan mo itong i-resolve diretso sa platform o sa taong involved. Pwede kaming tumulong mag-draft ng formal complaint base sa info na binigay mo, o ikonekta ka sa ibang resources.

res_imp_action_3.title: I-report ang Impersonation
res_imp_action_3.content: Mukhang kailangan mo itong i-resolve diretso sa platform o sa taong involved. Pwede kaming tumulong mag-draft ng formal complaint base sa info na binigay mo, o ikonekta ka sa ibang resources.

res_imp_security.title: I-secure ang Accounts Mo
res_imp_security.content: Kung na-expose ang login information mo, please palitan agad ang passwords mo at i-enable ang Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) sa lahat ng accounts.

res_imp_action_4.title: I-report ang Impersonation
res_imp_action_4.content: Mukhang kailangan mo itong i-resolve diretso sa platform o sa taong involved. Pwede kaming tumulong mag-draft ng formal complaint base sa info na binigay mo, o ikonekta ka sa ibang resources.

res_imp_security_2.title: I-secure ang Accounts Mo
res_imp_security_2.content: Kung na-expose ang login information mo, please palitan agad ang passwords mo at i-enable ang Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) sa lahat ng accounts.

res_harass_cyber.title: Potential Violation: Anti-Cybercrime Act
res_harass_cyber.content: Ang harassment/threats ay paulit-ulit at unwanted contact gamit ang digital means. Pwede itong maging violation ng Anti-Cybercrime Act.

res_harass_threats.title: Potential Violation: Grave Threats (Article 282)
res_harass_threats.content: Kung ang harassment ay may kasamang threats ng physical, reputational, o financial harm, pwedeng violation ito ng Article 282 (Grave Threats).

res_harass_safe_spaces.title: Potential Violation: Safe Spaces Act
res_harass_safe_spaces.content: Kung ang harassment ay directed sa babae at/o bata, pwedeng violation ito ng Safe Spaces Act.

res_harass_vawc.title: Potential Violation: Anti-VAWC Laws
res_harass_vawc.content: Kung ang harassment ay galing sa current o former intimate partner, pwedeng violation ito ng Anti-VAWC Laws (RA 9262).

res_imp_action_5.title: I-report ang Impersonation
res_imp_action_5.content: Mukhang kailangan mo itong i-resolve diretso sa platform o sa taong involved. Pwede kaming tumulong mag-draft ng formal complaint base sa info na binigay mo, o ikonekta ka sa ibang resources.

res_dox_npc.title: Data Privacy Violation
res_dox_npc.content: Mukhang violation ang na-experience mo ng Data Privacy Act (RA 10173). Pwede kaming tumulong mag-draft ng formal complaint.

res_dox_offline.title: Offline/Other Violation
res_dox_offline.content: Kung hindi ito nangyari gamit ang computer system, baka hindi ito Data Privacy Act violation, pero pwedeng illegal pa rin. Mag-consult sa legal counsel.
